comment: ### SIMPLY THE BEST! ### I really can't praise this app high enough... I'm really into tech' and can appreciate it when someone makes something that really matters for the time/age we live in and this app is the best you can get at what it does. This is one of the top 10 most important apps that every android user should have on every device be it a phone or tablet as it really is a one stop shop for everything to do with reading and making QR Codes. There's NO advertising and it doesn't need access to any of your personal information! So simple to use and manufacturers are starting to use them more & more in the setup instructions you get with tech' these days. Just today I got a new router delivered and by reading their code I had the app download and setup in no time compared to having to type the web address in manually. So you might not think you need it now, but trust me you will in the near future, so get the best while it's free.

A brilliant app, first barcode scanner I have found that enables you to use front camera as well as rear camera. (You can choose which one to use). Just two minor hiccups in that: •Flashlight doesn't turn back on when you return from a scan result, even with option turned on... AND •Beware of the widget; they may decide to rearrange themselves, used 4 lots of 1x1 widgets to fill a row up on home screen, turned device back on and they had moved to a new page in a quad formation - widget became bigger than 1x1 too. However; in comparison to the apps main features this is hypothetical.

author: Colin Lacina
comment: Only asks for permission to use the camera which is a HUGE plus in my book. Support for multiple languages is nice and has a few of privacy features that I hope will be expanded upon. It does ask for an email to activate password protection though which makes me slightly uncomfortable but a throw away email can always be set up and used. I will update this rating after some time using this app just to make sure everything works. UPDATE: Everything works!
title: More private alternative to QR Droid UPDATED

comment: Best QR app I've found.  Has the most customizable options out there.  Extremely granular control of every aspect to create/decode/choose action per type of qr scanned etc.   Simply the BEST out there
